title: cryptoplatz
author: cryptoplatz
content: Hi guys!Check it out the product that we are going to launchhttps://www.indiegogo.com/projects/cryptoplatz-cardMore information on our site: https://www.cryptoplatz.ch/FAQ:https://www.cryptoplatz.ch/supporthttps://static.wixstatic.com/media/25ca25_c0596fd7f0204f248b6c73111a27a5dd~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_307,h_500,al_c,q_85,enc_auto/app_card_500_white.pngCrypto Platz Metal Card+ Resistant to fire, water, bugs, shock wave and rust (better than a piece of paper)+ Warranty forever+ Encrypt your seed recovery phrase with AES-256+ Keep it offline+ Open source app (if you want to use)+ Easy to use with NFC (no more metal letters)Compare Crypto Platz Card with others options:https://www.cryptoplatz.ch/post/comparing-seed-phrase-backup

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: You would be better off placing this thread in this section of the forum to discuss https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=261.0Or in the Project Development  section of the forum  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=12.0You will get lots of feedback there  Hope this helps

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: If you have a prototype like you're saying, and you're planning to make the software open source, why not share it now? You should at least provide a demo video. I don't see anyone supporting this project without you providing these things.

comments.author: cryptoplatz
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on October 05, 2022, 01:14:21 PMIf you have a prototype like you're saying, and you're planning to make the software open source, why not share it now? You should at least provide a demo video. I don't see anyone supporting this project without you providing these things. You are right! We done a video now, please check it: https://youtu.be/KRzsZbiBLVI
